name: UFO Attack (KD_Games)
description:
Survive wave after wave of UFOs as they try to destroy you and Earth. Move by using "A" or "D", Jump with "Space", Super Jump with "Shift" and destroy UFOs for a chance at weapons or power up drops.

Game is endless until player dies. Achieve the highest score possible.

Currently there is: 7 Weapons (Pistol, SMG, Shotgun, Laser, RPG, Mine, EMP Gun) and 4 Pickups (Triple Damage, Invincibility, Energy Pickup, Health Pickup).

Still to add:

More weapons
VFX for getting hit
SFX for weapons
